Reviews.Title: Nice Lens
Reviews.Author: S. Sykes
Reviews.Content: It is a great addition to a Sony Nex camera.  Recommended, it is the lens I usually leave on the camera

Reviews.Title: Speedy shipment
Reviews.Author: Philip Lee
Reviews.Content: Received 1 day after ordered . Lens is amazingly sharp, perfect for video taping.Battery is not Sony brand, but works.

ProductInfo.Features:
Sony SEL55210 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 E-Mount Lens for Sony NEX Cameras
Replacment NP-FW50 Rechargeable Battery Pack
16 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card
Lens Carrying Pouch w/ Drawstring
Lens Pen Cleaning Tool
